values: The stars are blown about by the wind, pretending to be snowflakes but I am not fooled. I know them for that they are. I'll catch them on my tongue for courage. Then with the stars on my lips I shall be able to speak of those things that were till that moment poorly kept secrets. Till then, to all those unspoken words. . . .

Any one want a queen sized mattress and box springs?

My sister hates her bed, didn't even use it while she was here. It was too soft for her. So my mom wants to know if any one will take it off our hands.

It's a pillow top. . .I don't know what brand. In peachy condition.

msg me or call me if you want to know more or just need a good time to come get it.

A very singularly strange set of events for the past week or so...

First my sister decided to run away and join the Circus Saturday. Which she did yesterday morning. She is  in Florida now. . .I might not see her for 9 months. I keep getting all sorts of facial contortions and tears in the most embarrassing public places. . . suffice to say I'm going to miss her like mad and so far my insides aren't faring well with the idea. But I was a good girl and I didn't cry in front of my sister. I waited till she was out of site and entering the airport concourse.

Second there was the gravity shift and my car trying to escape.

...then two nights ago I got pulled over. So it turns out I shouldn't depend on the DMV to remind me to renew my registration...even though they did it for everyone else in the family and they've never failed to before.      So yeah, my tags have been expired since July. Woops. No one's noticed before Mr. RoboCop last night. I was all sweet and meek, because I cant seem to be any way else when I'm getting in trouble....and he was Still an ass. I guess he's too used to people giving him an attitude. So I didn't cry in front of him either. I'm afraid that if I let my self they'll just assume I'm trying to manipulate my way out of the ticket. So I waited till I was driving and didn't need to see anyway. Yeah you'd think I'd be dehydrated by now this month right? I got an $85 ticket and informed that he wasn't going to impound my car. I guess I'm grateful for that? Or at least I aught to be.
So I've been ranting about how rude the guy was and would it have killed him to speak to me as if I was a person? Well my dad, being the noble wonder that he is, talked to his buddy in the police department about the guy...who in turned talked to the guy. So less then a day later, that same sheriff calls the house looking to talk to my father about how his daughter feels she was treated.

I know I've mentioned I'd like to crawl into some deep dark hole in the past...but the desire is especially strong this week.

I even told both my parents, or rather reminded them, that I am a VERY sensitive individual and I'm probably over reacting. Cops just tend to be like that...who am I to complain that they treat me like any other human that breaks the law right?
Well it turns out he (the cop) is new to the force and fresh out of working in a 'correctional facility.' I guess that explains his demeanor. . .

Anyway...Crappy few days. Mixed with good. Don't get me wrong. It hasn't all been bad. I've got to hang out with some fantastic people...and spend a lot of bitter sweet time with my sister in the past few days. Not to mention my dad got my windshield replaced so now not only is it not shattered but it's like driving with a magical force field. . . .course now that it's dirty the illusion is a bit diminished.

I think the universe just likes seeing how much contrast my 'heart' can take before it starts looking for a new place to hide. Some where other then my chest I'd imagine.

Despite how very emotional that all sounds I feel pretty good at the moment. Weird huh?

Gravity shifted and magically pulled my car into the pasture behind our house while no one was home.

The break was on when I left it, off when I found it in the pasture. I know sometimes the parking break fails on cars and they roll off anyway but the break didn't fail, it was just off. Also, the hill (if you can call it that) from where it was parked is not steep enough for the car to really get rolling at all from a dead stop. Especially through a fence. Yep, right through the damned fence. Eventually it was stopped by a heroic tree sized bush...and thus the car isn't in the gully beyond the pasture.

I'm not a horrid person, I don't really have any one looking for evil revenge. Even my X's don't hate me that much... So I can't imagine who, if anyone would be tempted to help my car get a running start down the hill. I'm sure it is partially my fault for always leaving it unlocked...assuming it was someone and not some freak force of....weirdness?
Really I have no notion of how it would get into that situation on it's own.

I mean, it sat there all last night and this morning, and it was still there when I got my I-pod charger out of it at about 2pm...what strange force (besides pixies or people) could have made it move abruptly after all that time?

So the Windshield is a pretty work of spider webbed glass and the body is generally pretty scratched up...but we don't think there's any damage to the oil pan or the rest of the under carriage (we'll see for sure next time I get it on the lift). So far as we can tell it isn't leaking anything. We managed to get it back out of the pasture...and now it's all happy and sitting in the drive way waiting for a new windshield..which I really cant afford. Yay for my dad not having got me a holiday gift yet. Shiny new glass is going to do nicely.

I want to cry and scream and blame something or someone...but I've got nothing. Mostly I'm just confused and frustrated with life's craptastic little joke.

Soo... yeah. WEEE! Go Sunday nights! (insert a tun of rather necessary cussing here...it just looks too dumb to type all of it that is going through my head.)

...they want me to curl my hair today. Why does no one in my house have curlers?

Also by they...I dont just mean the people in my head. Some of them are on the outside.

I know its a long shot but November 4th at 7:30 the Metro State choirs are putting on a show. It would be lovely if people came. Not just because I crave attention but because I crave friend time and we could go out and do silly stuff after or something. It's a sunday, so there are classes in the morning but who needs sleep anyway right?

I want to have a Knitting Party!

....I'm not sure when....at all...maybe a thursday evening at some point?

Drinking and knitting...maybe at a bar as the old man in my house is sort of party sabotage. If any one has input or ideas telll me!

I got through about a page worth of writing before I found I hated how I sound tonight. No point in ranting really..not when I'm not going to think about the things I really need to rant about. Putting them down in words gives them more power over me..or it feels that way anyhow. 

I miss my friends. I miss Laura, Grant, Madison, My sister especially...I miss randomly sitting around starbucks or something and breaking into song. I miss brandishing wooden swords out the car window. I miss talking to everyone. I miss disney movies on mute with the radio providing the dubbing...which of course makes all sorts of creepy sense. I miss Mckayla though it's not like we've lost touch. I miss Kim. I miss Greg the way I remember him and wonder if he's really changed all that much. I miss summer camp before it seemed to complicate it self in my head. So much happens in my head. I miss getting tipsy back stage between sets at faire. I miss Brian's hugs even though I had one on sunday. I miss the very temporary ease of friendship I seemed to gain with Brandon at Dragon Fest. I miss Laura's mixed tapes and wonder if she's still listening to the same sort of music. I miss school being easy. I miss Kevin and it's rediclious because we never got close to begin with. I miss Justin and boffers...I miss Chelsea and I know she's nothing like she was when we used to hang....

and now I am done.

Please, will someone put Monday off for another week or two? . ..

Thanks in advance.

I hate them all. (skip to the last line...the rest is rant...un spell checked rant)

I don't want another Ipod. .it took the first one I bought maybe a year before bits stopped working. It was one ear bud at first, for some reason it would only play through one of the two leaving bits of the music out. . .so like a normal human I got new ear phones. Turned out they hadn't been the problem. Something in the ear phone jack was broken. So I gave up on that method of listening and got a new fm tuner that would plug into the bottom of my pod rather then the top (because the old tuner pluged into the broken ear phone jack). Well the new tuner worked poorly and I just sort of stopped listening to the Ipod. 

Eventually you get sick of the same old CD's and your radio. The ear phone jack doesn't work at all now. . .no music. So I can't even get the half sound I had been getting.

My options are taking the stupid thing apart (apperantly I'd have to pry it open after heating up the glue that holds the ends on the little mettal case) and try and replace the head phone jack...assuming it is the problem, I could send it in for fixing, or replace the entire thing with a new product. 

Well if I send it in it's almost as much money as it would be to get a new one, not to mention they just send you back a different refurbished one anyway...so why am I bothering to ask them to fix the one I have? I could just buy a refurbished one for the same damn price. 

I don't really want to send out $30 for a new part. We all know I'd probably just fowl it up trying to fix it my self anyway...If it didn't work I'd never even know if I'd been trying to fix the right problem in the first place...and I'd be out a good fist full of cash.

So I buy a new. . . something. Problem is I'm really picky. The Trekstore Vibez 8GB looks pretty good, and is a much better price...but I read one fairly bad review with pictures of one that had been used for a while and. . .well it put me off of spending money on it. Nothing else out there looks good to me. Yeah it's all about looks. I don't care about all the extra functions the thing comes with. So long as it has the basics and is cute. 

No luck, I'm too picky. . . I'll just have to burn lots of CD's and hope they work in my players.

It all comes down to AAaAAAAARRRRRGGGGG!. . .and maybe AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!

I just looked at my clock. It say's ll:57.

The thought that follows is. "Two minutes till midnight."

. . . . it's 11:57am.

I think maybe I switched something crucial in my brain in the last few days. 

I've killed my car 3 times this week, I haven't done that in ages.
Yesterday I sat 3 groups in a row in the same section at the restaurant.
I dreamt two nights ago that I was leaning out my car window while driving, my hand on a mountain goats collar...to lead it out of Parker road in Aurora.
Tonight I dreamt up a new drug they give you at some weird restaurant that you can choose to take (or not) after your meal. It cost $22. I don't think I took it, too expensive.
I keep thinking my cat is sleeping on me. I'll feel her weight on my stomach then come round enough to look and find nothing there. 

Oh and it doesn't sound like much but. . .for the first time in years my alarm clock managed to go off before I woke up to turn it off. It left me grouchy all day.

So It turns out that not only is my sun sign Cancer, but so is my rising sign. My moon sign is Libra. . .then there's the rest of the planets but I desided not to care as much about them.

^_^ I'm all Stormy! ^_^ Libra is an air element right?

I must stop looking so deeply into simple matters! Must stop over anylising EVERYTHING!


Wfoow. Anyway. The well was good, I wish they had more pools and less lights. 
Strawberry is predictably booked for January. I'm just going to bloody well reserve a cabin for spring break and then hope I'll find 2 or 3 people with the time to come with. . .and help pay for the cabin. Yeesh, I need my own 4 wheel drive car. . .or wings. 

I had another dream about Kevin. I can't figure out why, now, after finally dealing with my whole insanity over the guy, I'm having so many odd dreams about him. They aren't bad or anything. . .just slightly scewed versions of what could be the real world. I wake up almost thinking of them as memories rather then dreams. They just fail to feel very dream like. My subconcious is just not cooperating with it's fellows.

Logic 


You are driving down the road in your car on a wild, stormy night, when you pass by a bus stop and you see three people waiting for the bus: 
1. An old lady who looks as if she is about to die. 
2. An old friend who once saved your life. 
3. The perfect partner you have been dreaming about. 
Which one would you choose to offer a ride to, knowing that there could only be one passenger in your car. Think before you continue reading. 









Scroll down......











 
 
 
 
 
 
  
This is a moral/ethical dilemma that was once actually used a part of a job application. You could pick up the old lady, because she is going to die, and thus you should save her first. Or you could take the old friend because he once saved your life, and this would be the perfect chance to pay him back. However, you may never be able to find your perfect mate again. The candidate who was hired (out of 200 applicants) had no trouble coming up with his answer. He simply answered: "I would give the car keys to my old friend and let him take the lady to the hospital. I would stay behind and wait for the bus with the partner of my dreams." Sometimes, we gain more if we are able to give up our stubborn thought limitations. Never forget to Think Outside of the Box." 

HOWEVER.... 

The correct answer is to run the old lady over and put her out of her misery, have sex with the perfect partner on the hood of the car, then drive off with the old friend for a few beers. God, I just love happy endings!

The date for the fire (which may end up being inside.. if we turn into pansies because of the cold) is officially this Friday at 6pm.

Every one come! I will have coco and tea and marshmellows...chocolate...gramcrackers...

Bring a warm coat, drums, your body....what ever you think you need.

Who wants to have a fire this weekend?

I'm aware that nearly everyone is busy nearly all the time lately. And it sucks...but if any of you have Friday, Saturday, or Sunday night free this week message me or give me a ring. 
We cleared the Fire pit some weeks ago and I'd feel my grass burning quite a waste if no bigger flames came of it. 
 Drumming, Marsh mellows....silly camp songs, chanting...dumb stories...commiserating about crap. What ever you're up to.

This Friday, the 20th of, Fernn and I are planning to summon all of you boys and ghouls to go Haunted housing.

So If you want to go, give a shriek and I'll ring you when we have a gathering place in mind to begin from.
I'm quite fond of you...but then again...I'm quite mad.
All of us could take a lesson from the weather. It pays no attention to criticism.

My intel living on the Colorado Renaissance Faire Grounds has informed me that the Faire has been extended one weekend. That means it will be running one weekend in August. 

Honestly I do love working there but I am a little annoyed. If this is true, I'm still skeptical you see. 

Our contracts say 8 weekends, so does this mean We're going to get some extra payment?
"All by my self...dont wana be all by my self any more...." *waves lighter*

Have fun in Ireland Katie, bring be back something pretty and red headed....well I suppose he doesnt have to have red hair.

We'll miss you, we need to go out for drinks and giggles when you get back.

Middle school is fun...but I thought I was in college?

Hope to see everyone there!

I Auditioned today for the Magicals singing group and I'M IN! I will be singing Madrigals at fair this year with a smallish group of people. It's going to be lovely! I'm super excited! WEEEE!!!!!!!!!!! <-----About to burst with joy.

So on my Quiz thing (http://www01.quizyourfriends.com/linkquiz01.php?quizname=060129195245-14723&) Who are 'The Lord' And 'Jesus'? I'm amused. And of course, guessing in my brain. As apposed to outside it.

Pearl Lake Camping trip for everyone. yes invite who ever you want. You can pair off and ignore the people you don't get along with. Some time after May 12th...3 days or more of fun. Who's free when? Pearl Lake is near the hotsprings Grant, Julie, Katie and I went to a few spring breaks back. There is lots of hiking...we could bring some sort of blow up boat. . . get lost in the woods, soaked in little rivlets, broil at the hotspring, buy goodies in town, have silly little spats and pout on logs, burn things. . . run wild through camp like the rest of the 10 year olds. . . it'll be GREAT!
